title: Polar Bear Factory Postcard for Sale
author: jimonym

posts.post_title: Polar Bear Factory Postcard for Sale
posts.post_content:
SOLD

Shows the Luhrman and Wilbern Factory in Middletown, Ohio - "Home of the Polar Bear".

Used, postmarked 1912.  A couple small corner creases, otherwise nice shape.

Please email me with any questions: [url]jimonym@hotmail.com[/url].

Thanks.
